description: Retention of single storey outbuilding to the rear of the property (in a modified form)
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: Ordnance Survey Plan scale 1:1250; Block Plan scale 1:500; SP/5006/HR/02, dated and received September 2015; SP/5006/HR/03, dated and received November 2015  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | The outbuilding hereby permitted shall be used for domestic purposes ancillary to the enjoyment of the main dwellinghouse at 32 Marlborough Road, Southall, UB2 5LW, only and not for any other use.   Reason: To prevent the creation of a separate self-contained residential unit of accommodation in the interests of  the living conditions of the existing and future residents of the site and to ensure that the use of the building does not, by reason of any other activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with policies 1.1,1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), SPG 4, and policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 3.5, 7.4-7.6 of the London Plan (2015), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012). | No kitchen shall be installed into the outbuilding hereby approved at any time.  Reason: To prevent the creation of a separate self-contained residential unit of accommodation in the interests of  the living conditions of the existing and future residents of the site and to ensure that the use of the building does not, by reason of any other activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with policies 1.1,1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), SPG 4, and policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 3.5, 7.4-7.6 of the London Plan (2015), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012). | Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment or new Order), no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.  Reason: To protect residential amenity in accordance with policies 1.1, 1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), SPG 4, policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2015), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012).
